names: Sum of the Reciprocals of the Triangular Numbers
remarks: The sum of the reciprocals of the triangle numbers converge to two. This is Metamath 100 proof #42.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 23-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-May-2014.)
statement: trirecip $p |- sum_ k e. NN ( 2 / ( k x. ( k + 1 ) ) ) = 2 $.
